definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent

sentences.english: Hundreds of deceased soldiers lay in a state of disarray.
sentences.chinese: 數百名死去的士兵橫七豎八地躺在那裏。

sentences.english: We are all rather cross, and have rows about luggage.
sentences.chinese: 我們橫七豎八地和一排行李呆在一起。

sentences.english: The clutter of ships had little room to manoeuvre.
sentences.chinese: 船隻橫七豎八地擠在一起，幾乎沒有多少移動的空間。

sentences.english: Burned clothes lay in the garden, next to a plot of yellow dahlias.
sentences.chinese: 花園裏的一簇大麗花旁，燒過的衣服橫七豎八地躺着。

sentences.english: They had no heads but had legs sticking out at odd angles.
sentences.chinese: 它們沒有腦袋，許多隻腳橫七豎八地伸出來。

sentences.english: There, more than 200 trees fell into disorder longan trees in the orchard.
sentences.chinese: 那裏，200多棵龍眼樹橫七豎八地倒在果園中。
